summary: A Japanese-American fisherman is accused of killing his neighbor at sea. In the 1950s, race figures into the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.
cast: Ethan Hawke|Yûki Kudô|Reeve Carney|Anne Suzuki|Rick Yune|Max von Sydow|James Rebhorn|James Cromwell|Richard Jenkins|Arija Bareikis|Eric Thal|Celia Weston|Daniel von Bargen|Akira Takayama|Ako|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|Zak Orth|Max Wright|Sam Shepard|Caroline Kava|Jan Rubes|Sheila Moore|Zeljko Ivanek|Seiji Inouye|Saemi Nakamura|Mika Fujii|Dwight McFee|Bill Harper|Henry O|Myles Ferguson|Noah Heney|John Destry|A. title: Mientras nieva sobre los cedros
